about.kicker: Strong technical base • Production-focused • Continuous improvement
about.headline: SAP development focused on stable delivery, solid integrations, and user-friendly execution.
about.body:
I have worked as a full stack SAP developer since 2022, primarily with SAP Fiori/SAPUI5 on the front end and ABAP (RAP), CDS Views, and OData services on the back end.

I work in a production context: fixes, enhancements, and continuous evolution, aiming for consistent OData contracts, well-modeled data, and performance that holds up under real usage.

On SAP BTP, I have experience with SAP CAP, SAP Integration Suite (iFlows), and SAP HANA Cloud, contributing to integrations and greenfield solutions. I have also worked on web and hybrid mobile scenarios, including offline support (e.g., SAPUI5 in HAT/Asset Manager), when operations depend on limited connectivity.
